snippet.title: Micro Mages Launch Trailer | PS5 - PS4
snippet.description:
Micro Mages is now available on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008684/

This version comes with new features: online multiplayer, widescreen borders, 40 trophies and more.

Micro Mages for PlayStation supports up to 4 simultaneous players in local and online modes. We made sure the game plays well in single player mode, but for that extra bit of fun, do invite friends and family!

#ps5games
#ps4games

© 2024 Morphcat Games
PlayStation Port by Implicit Conversions Inc.
